title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier. 2. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and begin the export to the zip file.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up: 'Problems were encountered during export' and the detail lists the file with the same name in project2 as the problem.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files, regardless of any files with the same name but different directories.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select multiple files with the same name under different directories. 3. Specify a name for the zip file. 4. Initiate the export process and observe the error message.
